title: Can't Authenticate on NA
body:
I have tried all of the troubleshooting steps:
|- Reset network
|- Restart computer
|- Uninstall/Reinstall (2x)
|- Hextech Repair Tool

I have had this problem for 3 days now.

Additional oddities:
|- Wrong password, immediate feedback
|- Can log into other servers just fine (Tested EUW with another account)
|- My friends banned account also got immediate feedback

I'm quite confused as to what is going on.

EDIT:
I keep seeing this error over and over again in the LOGS:

000149.337|  ERROR|                  lol-login: ALE-4FBFEF56 - CONNECT_FAILED - Failed to connect with socket: A connection attempt failed because the connected party did not properly respond after a period of time, or established connection failed because connected host has failed to respond.

EDIT2:

I performed a tracert:

Tracing route to 192.64.170.1 over a maximum of 30 hops

  1    <1 ms    <1 ms    <1 ms  ARCHER_C50 [192.168.0.1] 
  2     1 ms    <1 ms    <1 ms  129.2.204.1 
  3     1 ms    <1 ms    <1 ms  128.8.0.178 
  4     1 ms     1 ms    <1 ms  128.8.0.158 
  5     1 ms    <1 ms    <1 ms  128.8.0.71 
  6     1 ms     1 ms     1 ms  te0-1-0.css-max-r1.net.umd.edu [128.8.0.226] 
  7     3 ms     2 ms     2 ms  50-234-216-229-static.hfc.comcastbusiness.net [50.234.216.229] 
  8     2 ms     2 ms     2 ms  ae-65-0-ar01.manassascc.va.bad.comcast.net [68.85.67.113] 
  9     2 ms     2 ms     2 ms  te-9-4-ur01.dover.de.bad.comcast.net [68.87.168.61] 
 10     4 ms     5 ms     4 ms  be-33657-cr02.ashburn.va.ibone.comcast.net [68.86.90.57] 
 11     4 ms     3 ms     3 ms  hu-0-10-0-2-pe07.ashburn.va.ibone.comcast.net [68.86.83.74] 
 12    21 ms    20 ms    21 ms  e0-0.cr01.atl01.mzima.net [75.149.228.166] 
 13     *        *        *     Request timed out.
...
 30     *        *        *     Request timed out.

Trace complete.

replies.body:
I just had this issue.

Got in a ranked game after I logged online, couldn't ban anybody - neither could 2 of my other teamates. So we all were forced out of the match, I ended up having to close the game out. So I tried to log back in . . . but I authenticated forever. So I quit out . . .

After doing that, I was authenticating for about 1-2 minutes - in response, I finally got a message saying: https://puu.sh/xPhTY/d976ee670d.png
This happened to me too. In ranked. Extremely frustrating.
SAME FRIKEN THING RITO FIX THIS NOW!!!!!!
Thanks for the report.  There were ISP issues yesterday, but everything should be okay now.  Let me know if you're still having an issue, though.

Things are working again for me, thanks!

Was is the last hop that was a critical one? Seems strange where it died in the tracert
